item.title: Your 1099-DA Is Wrong: How BasisGuard Catches What Your Exchange Missed
item.description: Most crypto sold in 2026 is 'noncovered' on your 1099-DA — meaning the IRS sees your cost basis as zero. Learn how BasisGuard detects and fixes these gaps before you file.

item.title: Why TikTok Blocked 37 Million Listings — And How to Protect Yours
item.description: TikTok Shop removed 37M+ listings in 2024 and took down 2M more products in just H1 2025. Learn why sellers get blindsided and how to scan your listings before they go live.

item.title: MTD, EPC C, and the Renters' Rights Act: What UK Landlords Need to Know in 2026
item.description: MTD starts 6 April 2026, Section 21 is abolished 1 May 2026, and EPC Band C is confirmed for October 2030. Here's what UK landlords need to do right now.
